tool_description: Professional online invoicing service, designed for small businesses and freelancers.
name: Billiving
title: Billiving

api_list.name: Account Summary
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://billiving-billiving-v1.p.rapidapi.com/reports/accountsummary"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "billiving-billiving-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List estimates

optional_parameters.name: FileType
optional_parameters.description: May be specified for file download. Applicable values are CSV or XSLX

optional_parameters.name: companyid
optional_parameters.description: Applicable if managing multiple companies to issue estimates

api_list.name: List invoices

optional_parameters.name: CompanyId
optional_parameters.description: Applicable if managing multiple companies to issue invoices

optional_parameters.name: FileType
optional_parameters.description: May be specified for file download. Applicable values are CSV or XSLX

api_list.name: List clients

optional_parameters.name: OrderBy
optional_parameters.description: Order result set by the specified field

api_list.name: List products

optional_parameters.name: OrderBy
optional_parameters.description: Order result set by specified field

optional_parameters.name: Count
optional_parameters.description: When count equals 1 record count is returned

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: Records to skip used for paging

optional_parameters.name: top
optional_parameters.description: Records to fetch used for paging

optional_parameters.name: statusid
optional_parameters.description: List of statuses is available under Enumerations

optional_parameters.name: freesearch
optional_parameters.description: Search ItemId, short descripton, full description & tags fields
